name: Mental Health Services
description: The Mission Family Center serves children and adolescents (aged 3 to 19 years old) with serious mental or emotional problems by providing the following mental health services: - Individual, family, parent, and group therapy - Early intervention for preschoolers How to Apply: - Call by phone: mainline number listed above - If no one is available to answer, leave a message.
